Title: Into Asylum
Plot: Now that Nathan?s ability has been revealed and he has lost control of his operation, he and Claire go into hiding in Mexico. With Emile Danko now in control of the government operation, his plan to destroy everyone with abilities is set into motion as he teams up with an unlikely partner. Meanwhile, Angela and Peter seek refuge in a church and begin to mend their broken relationship.
GuestStars: Kevin Alejandro, Jake McLaughlin, Zeljko Ivanek
